page.title: 02EDUCATION. HOPE C.E PRIMARY
page.content:
Hope School was built in 1968 and had 55pupils at the end of the Summer Term 1985.The staff includes a eadmistress/class teacher, 2 part time lower junior teachers and an Infant teacher. Lunch is from 12.15 pm to 1.30pm.The children either enjoy school lunches,prepared on site or bring their own packed lunch.School lunches are 60p per day and consist of a good variety ofmain courses and sweets throughout the week. A thriving P.T.A. raises money, and in 1984/85 has provided reading books,a computer and physical education equipment.
It is a very happy school and a focal point for the area,being set on the hill above the A488,with lovely grounds.
